name: 2022 5th International Conference on Frontiers of Image Processing
content: Paper Publication: Papers submitted to ICFIP 2022, will be peer reviewed by both the conference scientific committees and JOIG editorial board, and accepted papers will be published in Journal of Image and Graphics (ISSN:2301-3699), which will be indexed by Scopus (Since 2021), Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
